p: The group comprised of 23 West Highland white terriers with canine idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis and 21 dogs of other breeds with the following lung diseases; chronic bronchitis 13/21, eosinophilic bronchopneumopathy 2/21 and interstitial lung disease 2/21. In 4/21 dogs with chronic respiratory signs (cough and/or tachypnea) and chronic diffuse radiographic lung changes, a final diagnosis was not established.
